data.name: Ship Builder Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Add to wishlist

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1201330/


Play Free Demo

https://store.steampowered.com/app/844980/I_Am_Your_President/


About the Game

You could have become a plain fisherman, average baker or just a farmer. You could have, but instead you decided to build your own ship empire and allow brave folks to discover the whole New World. Can you see to it that your dreams come true or will you let some other daredevils succeed before you?

Well, to make that happen you have to build a shipyard from the scratch, so you better take an axe and prepare for the hard work. Chopping the immense pines, old oaks and distorted beeches will provide the materials and your own imagination can transform them into some fine ships ready to sail into the unknown.

Enjoy the time spend on this far away island and give yourself a new beginning. Realistic graphics will allow you to sink into this unspoilt world and make you want to explore all of its nooks and crannies. Mysterious wrecks, hidden treasures, pirate’s maps – all of these just waiting for your discovery.
Just roll up your sleeves and get started!

To-do list:

  • Acquire the wood and new commissions.
  • Develop your shipyard.
  • Improve your woodworking skills.
  • Beat the competitors by thinking wider, planning bolder and acting faster.
  • Compare your accomplishments with other players.
  • Meet the locals, befriend them and establish a base of customers.
  • Examine the island closely to make sure you don’t miss any of the interesting spots.
  • Relax and see the sights of nature around you.
  • Simply pay the visit to distant islands – isn’t that what you always wanted?
Challenge yourself and become the greatest ship maker ever and go down in history as the New World’s pioneer!

data.short_description: Build your own ship empire! Acquire the materials, design the construction and get down to work! Start with something simple, gain experience and learn to create ships such as galleons or caravels. Challenge yourself and become the greatest ship maker ever.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
